wikipedia_page.main: Leslie Alan Dunkling (born 1935) is an author known for his authoritative work on names books, ranging from names people choose for their children to names of pubs.

response: In many societies, beer is the most popular alcoholic drink. Various social traditions and activities are associated with beer drinking, such as playing cards, darts, or other pub games; attending beer festivals; engaging in zythology (the study of beer); visiting a series of pubs in one evening; visiting breweries; beer-oriented tourism; or rating beer.Leslie Dunkling & Michael Jackson, The Guinness Drinking Companion, Lyons Press (2003),  Drinking games, such as beer pong, are also popular.Best Drinking Game Book Ever, Carlton Books (28 October 2002),  A relatively new profession is that of the beer sommelier, who informs restaurant patrons about beers and food pairings.

The use of Master as a prefixed title is, according to Leslie Dunkling, "a way of addressing politely a boy ... too young to be called 'Mister'."Leslie Dunkling, Dictionary of Epithets and Terms of Address (2012). It can be used as a title and form of address for any boy.
In A Dictionary of Epithets and Terms of Address author Leslie Dunkling
